resources.string: Hello!! This is My Very Own Collection. Ever I was a kid to now I love plastic, I love game Discs, and I love Gaming Hardware.It has been a part of my life and it will always be special for me to the point that I would like to share to the closest people that I know the Andy\'s Collection.

No One can ever forget their first Console and man i am so happy that i actually grew up with a console like this. This has been special to me so much that i dont think i would be the same person as i am today if i didnt grew up with the Gamecube today because my first 2 games that i played made me the way who i am today. This was bought as welcoming gift from moving from new york to miami at the age of 4. This is where it all started

This was my Third ever console that i have ever gotten. But I didnt get the classic, nor modern version. What you are seeing in the left is a wii Mini. An East Coast (of the world) EXCLUSIVELY for North and South America, And Buget Friendly version of the Wii. that was my first wii. Bought it in 2012. Years Later in 2015-16. One of my Parents friends gifted me a Modern Wii, the One in the Right and the one that i got recently from a friend of mine, the classic version the white one in the middle
